metadata.title: CVE-2017-2931 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 24.0.0.186 and earlier have an exploitablememory corruption vulnerability related to the parsing of SWF metadata.Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2931` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 24.0.0.194ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 24.0.0.194ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '24.0.0.194ubuntu0.14.04.1').
